name: Strange New Bodies
description:
Greetings Space Citizens!

We're building a compelling future full of silly humor and fantastical adventures. The tone here will always be positive, since as we all know - it's the power of friendship and science that will get us through! The game is free to play, but if you help us out you can get access to early builds and even helps us design it!

We look forward to your feedback and support. A Beta build is released on the 1st of every month and a full release on the 7th!

Together, let's explore Strange New Bodies. :)

-The SNB Team

p.s. You can support us over on Patreon if ya feel like it.

😎

Currently in the Game:

  • A well-crafted story that takes place on a derelict carrier in orbit around the moon of Umbriel.
  • Character progression, jobs, body mods and items! All that good RPG-ness.
  • Dad jokes. Puns. Awkward moments? (Always with the awkward moments)
  • Time travel, vending machine romance, tentacle-cats, and ancient mysteries!

Planned:

  • More story! More quests!
  • Mini-games for jobs!
  • Beautifully rendered backgrounds and characters!
  • Shenanigans!

Team:

  • Greatexperiment - Design, Writing, Coding, UI
  • Hajime - Design, Writing
  • Claudi Weather - Characters
  • FlashFastBlack - Backgrounds
  • ThisGuyJust - Sound, Music
  • MisterShake - Additional Coding

Want to say Hello? Talk with Us!

Discord
